title: 12 MIN PILATES CORE WORKOUT | RA PILATES (at home, mat pilates, no equipment)
description:
Hi everyone! 

Grab your mat and give this new 12 Min Pilates Core workout a try at home, at the gym, or on the go. This workout is Intermediate level, so feel free to pause and take breaks when needed, or repeat if you want an extra burn! No equipment needed, just a Pilates mat or soft surface. 

If you like this workout and want to follow along with more guided Pilates classes like this, you can try out the RA Pilates app for free at rapilates.com! The app has Pilates workout challenges, progress tracking tools, recipe books, motivational group chat, and so much more to help support you and keep you motivated on your fitness + wellness journey! 

Need a little extra support? Try RA Pilates 1:1 Personalized Training - receive all the benefits of the app, plus a fully customized plan tailored to your unique needs, designed to match your fitness level and target your goals, with ongoing personalized coaching and accountability through private chat with our expert team. Sign up today at rapilates.com!

xx
channelDescription:
Hi! I’m Rachel, founder of RA Pilates. My goal is to help you make daily movement a habit through effective at-home Pilates workouts that give you real, sustainable results. Whether you’re just starting out or looking to take your fitness to the next level, RA Pilates is designed to help you build consistency, improve strength, and feel confident in your body. 

On this channel, I share some of my long-form Pilates workouts designed to help you tone your body and support you on your wellness journey. For a deeper, more personalized experience, I created the RA Pilates app to offer structured, guided Pilates programs, personalized 1:1 training, progress tracking tools, nutrition, community, and more. The RA Pilates app is built to fit seamlessly into your daily life and guide you every step of the way.

Try the app free today at www.rapilates.com 
RA Pilates | Guided Pilates Workouts
